Error Messages: Please fill in the required fields below before submitting.
Error Alert Messages: Please fill out all mandatory fields!
rating_alert: You cannot provide rating at this moment because some employees are still pending 360 reviews or pending calibration at the previous layer. Please reach out to your team or the relevant parties to follow up on these reviews. You can download the file available on this page for more detailed data.
rating_employee_single: If there is only 1 employee, the Rater can select any rating between ':secondKey' - ':lastKey'.
rating_employee_double: If there are 2 employees, you can select any rating between ':firstKey' - ':lastKey'. However, the selected rating will be available to be allocated only 1 time.
Text Not Allowed: Some employees are still incomplete. Please reach out to the pending employees.
Text Mismatch_1: The following ratings do not meet the expected Target
Text Mismatch_2: Please adjust the given ratings to follow the established rules and targets. Rows that do not comply are highlighted in red color in the table.
Text Ratings are Empty: Please select a rating for all employees.
Confirm Messages: You can still change it as long as the manager hasn't approved it yet
Error Confirm Weightage Messages_2: Please adjust to reach the total weightage of 100%.
